src:
Pohon Tumbang di Jakarta Timpa Rumah, Kabel Listrik, Mobil
06 Nov 2019, 22:27 by ANTARA, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Ilustrasi pohon tumbang. (CNN Indonesia/Joko Panji Sasongko)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Hujan yang terjadi pada Rabu (6/11) sore di Jakarta dilaporkan menyebabkan pohon tumbang yang menimpa rumah, kabel listrik, dan mobil. Berdasarkan laporan Antara, pohon beringin berukuran besar tumbang kemudian menimpa rumah warga serta kabel listrik di Jakarta Timur. Gara-gara kejadian itu dilakukan pemadaman aliran listrik pada pukul 17.50 WIB."Pohon beringin berdiameter 50 sentimeter menimpa kabel listrik di Kelurahan Pekayon, Pasar Rebo," kata Kepala Seksi Damkar Jakarta Timur, Gatot Sulaeman, di Jakarta.Rumah yang tertimpa berada di Jalan Bungur 5 Kampung Rambutan, Ciracas. Rumah milik Junaedi (75) itu tertimpa pohon setinggi 10 m dan berdiameter 45 cm.Sementara itu Komandan Pleton (Danton) Pemadam Kebakaran dan Penyelamat (PKP) Sektor Sembilan Pasar Minggu, Jakarta Selatan, Ruwanto mengatakan ada dua pohon tumbang di dua lokasi berbeda di Jakarta Selatan. Pohon tumbang pertama terjadi di Universitas Pancasila (UP) di kawasan Jagakarsa. "Di UP ada dua unit mobil sedang parkir tertimpa pohon tumbang, kejadian sore hari," kata Ruwanto.Sedangkan lokasi pohon tumbang kedua berada di Jalan Kebagusan Raya, RT 1/RW 4, dekat masjid Nurul Huda. Pohon mangga tumbang menimpa satu pikap B 9778 EAG milik toko baja."Mobil sedang bongkar muat barang, tiba-tiba pohon di sampingnya tumbang menimpa atap mobil. Laporannya mobil ringsek, gepeng atapnya," kata Ruwanto.Tidak ada laporan korban jiwa atas kejadian di Jakarta Timur dan Selatan. Hujan dengan intensitas sedang mengguyur Jakarta sejak 17.55 WIB pada hari ini. Sudah dua hari Jakarta diguyur hujan menjelang malam hari. (fea)
text:
Tumbang Trees in Jakarta overwrite houses, power lines, cars
06 Nov 2019, 22:27 by ANTARA, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Illustration of fallen tree. (CNN Indonesia / Joko Panji Sasongko)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - Rain that occurred on Wednesday (11/6) afternoon in Jakarta was reported to have caused fallen trees that hit houses, electric cables, and cars. Based on Antara's report, a large banyan tree fell and then fell on a resident's house and an electric cable in East Jakarta. "The black tree with a diameter of 50 centimeters struck the power cable in Pekayon Village, Pasar Rebo," said East Jakarta Damkar Section Head Gatot Sulaeman, in Jakarta. Bungur 5 Kampung Rambutan, Ciracas. The house owned by Junaedi (75) was hit by a tree as high as 10 m and 45 cm in diameter. Meanwhile, the Platoon Commander (Danton) of the Fire and Rescue (PKP) Sector Nine Market Sunday, South Jakarta, Ruwanto said there were two fallen trees in two different locations in South Jakarta. The first fallen tree occurred at the Pancasila University (UP) in the Jagakarsa area. "In UP there were two units of cars being parked down by a fallen tree, an evening incident," Ruwanto said. While the location of the second fallen tree was on Jalan Kebagusan Raya, RT 1 / RW 4, near the Nurul Huda mosque. A fallen mango tree fell on a pickup B 9778 EAG owned by a steel shop. "The car was loading and unloading, suddenly the tree next to it fell on the roof of the car. The report was a wrecked car, flattened the roof," Ruwanto said. East and South Jakarta. Rain with moderate intensity flushed Jakarta since 17.55 WIB today. Jakarta has been raining for two days before nightfall. (fea)
